Articles.Content:
I'm sure this may have been discussed to death at least in part elsewhere, but the idea occurred to me just now:

Instead of having a custom asteroid belt with dozens of tracked objects, would it be feasible to have a single rotating hoop on rails (with a diameter of 2+AU) , perhaps linked to a single ceres-type asteroid ?
And if so, would doing it this way significantly reduce performance loss (i.e. make it so you could have MAOR asteroids?)
Also assuming that none of these asteroids would be moveable, no matter how small.
